name: Using MySQL with Java
body:
# Simple java application for data insertion and retrieve [ mysql dbms used ]

Developed by:

Abdullahil Ashik Md Arefin
***
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Varendra University.
***
Programmer, Blue Hills IT Services.
***


## Instructions

For running this project you will need to install mysql database connector j, add the library to your project.
Install mysql dbms.
Create a database named practice and a table from the below query,
`create table employee(name text, phone text, email text, address text);`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
